firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Quad J Realty
firm_information.location: 1305 N. E. Big Bend Trail Glen Rose, TX 76043

house_listing.house_description: 101.35 ac wooded, great cattle or hunting place with a seculded stock tank . There is a hill offering fantastic views for a building site, also a shallow well with a wind mill. The fences are very good. If you want in the country this is the place.
